title: Bug 122584: Cascading parameter values not displayed properly in HTML viewer
description: Description: Cascading parameter values cannot be displayed properly in the HTML viewer.
OB: When selecting the first parameter value in a cascading parameter group, the expected behavior is for the second parameter value in the same group to be displayed. However, the second parameter value is not displayed in the HTML viewer.
EB: The expected behavior is that when the first parameter value is selected, the second parameter value in the same cascading parameter group should be displayed in the HTML viewer.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the HTML viewer.
2. Select the first parameter value in a cascading parameter group.
3. Observe that the second parameter value is not displayed.
